Title: Basilisk
Legend: Basilisks are creatures so inimical to life that they poison the very ground they walk on. They are a living blight that can swiftly reduce an area to ruinous wasteland, destroying crops and slaughtering livestock with venom that suffuses both body and spirit.
Intro: A Basilisk is armed with Acidic Spittle, a Venomous Bite and Clutching Claws.

Rules.Name: Monstrous Ally
Rules.Rule: MONSTROUS ALLY: This unit can be included as an allied unit in an army whose general has the DESTRUCTION keyword.

Rules.Name: Corrosive Miasma
Rules.Fluff: The poisons that emanate from the Basiliskâ€™s skin are so toxic that they leave anyone nearby choking on their own blood as they fall victim to their corrosive effects.
Rules.Rule: ABILITIES At the start of the combat phase, roll a dice for each enemy unit within 3" of this model. On a 2+, that unit suffers 1 mortal wound.

Rules.Name: Malignant Gaze
Rules.Fluff: The Basilisk focuses its malice upon its intended victim, its eyes radiating with evil as the enemy slowly melts into a pile of steaming flesh and blistering metal.
Rules.Rule: In your hero phase, you can pick 1 enemy unit within 12" of this model and visible to it, and roll a dice. On a 1, nothing happens. On a 2-3, that unit suffers D3 mortal wounds. On a 4+, that unit suffers D3+1 mortal wounds.
